costUnit.description: The currency in which all energy cost values are being expressed.

deviceSummaries.description:
The list of devices attached to the service.
Note: when using the Services service, this list is always empty. It is populated only when using the Service Details service.

emittedCo2Unit.description: The unit in which all CO<sub>2</sub> emission values are being expressed.

energyConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which all energy consumption values are being expressed.

heatingMargin.description:
The lowest heating margin among the heating margins of the devices attached to the service.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginCoverage.description:
The percentage of devices attached to the service, whose heating margin could be found.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceName.description:
The name of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceUrl.description:
The link to the details of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description: The unit in which the heating margin of the service is being expressed.

historyParentIdKey.description: The name of the key used to identify the service in the history table.

numberOfDevices.description: The number of devices attached to the service.

oneDayConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the daily energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneDayCost.description:
The daily cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the service.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the service during one day.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the service during one day.

oneMonthConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the monthly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneMonthCost.description:
The monthly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the service.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the service during one month.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the service during one month.

oneYearConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the yearly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneYearCost.description:
The yearly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the service.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the service in one year.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the service during one year.

providerId.description: The ID of the server providing the service.

totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption of the devices attached to the service.

totalPowerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the total power consumption of the devices attached to the service is being expressed.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

url.description: The link to the service details.

mappings.name: Updates the values of the energy footprint parameter for a specific group.
Updates the values of the energy footprint parameter for a specific group.
Updates the values of the energy footprint parameter for a specific group.

co2Emission.description: The CO<sub>2</sub> emissions for all devices. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

co2EmissionUnit.description: The unit in which the CO<sub>2</sub> emission is being expressed.

editable.description: If true, indicates that you do not have sufficient rights to update the global settings. However, you may still have sufficient rights to update a specific group's setting.

energyCost.description: The electricity rate for all devices. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

energyCostUnit.description: The unit in which the electricity rate is being expressed.

groupNameFilter.description: Regular expression used to filter the groups for which the power consumption will be reported.

heatingMargin.description:
The lowest heating margin among the heating margins of all the devices.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginCoverage.description:
The percentage of devices whose heating margin could be found.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceName.description:
The name of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceUrl.description:
The link to the details of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description: The unit in which the heating margin is being expressed.

id.description: The ID of the global summary (this ID will always be "global").

totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption of all the devices.

totalPowerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the total power consumption is being expressed.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

mappings.name: Gets detailed information about a specific group.
Gets detailed information about a specific group.

ambientTemperature.description: The average ambient temperature based on the ambient temperatures of the devices attached to the group.

ambientTemperatureUnit.description: The unit in which the ambient temperature value is being expressed.

co2Emission.description: The CO<sub>2</sub> emissions for all devices attached to the group. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

co2EmissionUnit.description: The unit in which the user-defined CO<sub>2</sub> emission value is being expressed.

costUnit.description: The currency in which all energy cost values are being expressed.

editable.description: The name of the key used to identify the group in the history table.

emittedCo2Unit.description: The unit in which all emitted CO<sub>2</sub> quantities are being expressed.

energyConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which all energy consumption values are being expressed.

energyCost.description: The electricity rate for all devices attached to the group. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

energyCostUnit.description: The unit in which th euser-defined electricity rate value is being expressed.

heatingMargin.description:
The lowest heating margin among the heating margins of the devices attached to the group.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginCoverage.description:
The percentage of devices attached to the group, whose heating margin could be found.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceName.description:
The name of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceUrl.description:
The link to the details of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description: The unit in which the heating margin of the group is being expressed.

numberOfDevices.description: The number of devices attached to the group.

oneDayConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the daily energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneDayCost.description:
The daily cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the group.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the group during one day.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the group during one day.

oneMonthConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the monthly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneMonthCost.description:
The monthly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the group.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the group during one month.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the group during one month.

oneYearConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the yearly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneYearCost.description:
The yearly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the group.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the group in one year.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the group during one year.

serverId.description: The ID of the server the group is attached to.

totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption of the devices attached to the group.

totalPowerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the total power consumption of the devices attached to the group is being expressed.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

url.description: The link to the group details.

schema.description: Contains all information regarding a specific PATROL Agent.

connectionStatus.description: The status of the PATROL Agent's connection.

id.description: The ID of the PATROL Agent.

name.description: The FQDN of the PATROL Agent.

version.description: The version of the PATROL Agent.

mappings.name: Gets detailed information about a specific device.
Gets detailed information about a specific device.
Gets detailed information about a specific device.

agentId.description: The ID of the PATROL Agent the device is attached to.

agentName.description: The name of the PATROL Agent the device is attached to.

ambientTemperature.description: The ambient temperature of the device.

collectTime.description:
The collection time of the heating margin (as an Epoch time, in seconds).
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

deviceUrl.description: The link to the device details.

heatingMargin.description:
The heating margin of the device.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description:
The unit in which the heating margin of the device is being expressed.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

powerConsumption.description: The power consumption of the device.

powerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the power consumption of the device is being expressed.

productVersion.description:
The Hardware Sentry KM version of the device's Monitor.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

serverId.description: The ID of the server the device is attached to.

serverName.description: The name of the server the device is attached to.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

mappings.name: Gets overall information for all devices.
Gets overall information for all devices.

co2Emission.description: The CO<sub>2</sub> emissions for all devices. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

co2EmissionUnit.description: The unit in which the CO<sub>2</sub> emission is being expressed.

editable.description: If true, indicates that you do not have sufficient rights to update the global settings. However, you may still have sufficient rights to update a specific group's setting.

energyCost.description: The electricity rate for all devices. This value can be updated by users with sufficient permissions.

energyCostUnit.description: The unit in which the electricity rate is being expressed.

groupNameFilter.description: Regular expression used to filter the groups for which the power consumption will be reported.

heatingMargin.description:
The lowest heating margin among the heating margins of all the devices.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginCoverage.description:
The percentage of devices whose heating margin could be found.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceName.description:
The name of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceUrl.description:
The link to the details of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description: The unit in which the heating margin is being expressed.

id.description: The ID of the global summary (this ID will always be "global").

totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption of all the devices.

totalPowerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the total power consumption is being expressed.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

mappings.name: Gets summarized information about all monitored devices.
Gets summarized information about all monitored devices.
Gets summarized information about all monitored devices.

items.description: The list of currently accessible results.

restrictedRights.description: If true, indicates that you are denied access to part of, or all the results.

total.description: The total number of accessible results, including the results not listed in items.

mappings.name: Gets the Monitors for a specific device. (application/json)
Gets the Monitors for a specific device. - 200

costUnit.description: The currency in which all energy cost values are being expressed.

deviceSummaries.description:
The list of devices attached to the application.
Note: when using the Applications service, this list is always empty. It is populated only when using the Application Details service.

emittedCo2Unit.description: The unit in which all CO<sub>2</sub> emission values are being expressed.

energyConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which all energy consumption values are being expressed.

heatingMargin.description:
The lowest heating margin among the heating margins of the devices attached to the application.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginCoverage.description:
The percentage of devices attached to the application, whose heating margin could be found.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceName.description:
The name of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginDeviceUrl.description:
The link to the details of the device having the lowest heating margin.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be found.

heatingMarginUnit.description: The unit in which the heating margin of the application is being expressed.

historyParentIdKey.description: The name of the key used to identify the application in the history table.

numberOfDevices.description: The number of devices attached to the application.

oneDayConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the daily energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneDayCost.description:
The daily cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the application.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the application during one day.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneDayEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the application during one day.

oneMonthConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the monthly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneMonthCost.description:
The monthly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the application.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the application during one month.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneMonthEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the application during one month.

oneYearConfidence.description:
The confidence score (percentage) for the yearly energy consumption, energy cost and CO2 emission values.
The lower the confidence score, the more extrapolated the values are.

oneYearCost.description:
The yearly cost of the energy consumed by the devices attached to the application.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEmittedCo2.description:
The quantity of CO2 emitted by the devices attached to the application in one year.
Note:This field will only be present if a value could be computed.

oneYearEnergyConsumption.description: The quantity of energy consumed by the devices attached to the application during one year.

totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption of the devices attached to the application.

totalPowerConsumptionUnit.description: The unit in which the total power consumption of the devices attached to the application is being expressed.

updateTimestamp.description: The data collection time (as an Epoch time, in seconds).

url.description: The link to the application details.

total.description: The total number of accessible results, including the results not listed in items.
